sentences.english: The arid valleys of the Minjiang River is the worst ecotope in West China.
sentences.chinese: 岷江干旱河谷是我國西部生態環境最惡劣的地區之一。

sentences.english: His bedroom was tolerably large, and rather difficult to warm in bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 他的房間相當大，在惡劣的季節裏相當難於保暖。

sentences.english: Sucking or chewing on the chopsticks is considered poor manners.
sentences.chinese: 吸吮或咀嚼對筷子被認爲是態度惡劣。
你今晚的行爲是惡劣的。

sentences.english: The bad weather detained the travellers for several hours.
sentences.chinese: 惡劣的天氣耽擱了旅行者幾個小時。

sentences.english: No one can work in such blisteringly harsh weather conditions.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人可以在這種極度惡劣的氣候中工作。

sentences.english: There is really no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather.
sentences.chinese: 世上實無惡劣天氣，只有好天氣的種種不同罷了。

sentences.english: Have a cold or a tummy ache?
sentences.chinese: 感冒了或者是肚子痛惡劣？

sentences.english: She said, however, that because \"a very bad harm was done, \" the courts may grant some latitude.
sentences.chinese: 她說，因爲這個案件情節惡劣，法庭可能會放寬限制。

sentences.english: F.D.R. was called a lot worse names than socialist.
sentences.chinese: 羅斯福因此被稱作是比社會主義者還“惡劣”的人。

sentences.english: Detectors have weatherproof housings for reliable operation in harsh conditions.
sentences.chinese: 探測器有防水外殼，能在惡劣條件下正常運行。

sentences.english: The division lost nine men during one 10-day period because of the conditions.
sentences.chinese: 由於環境惡劣，該部隊曾在10天之內損失9個人。

sentences.english: Because of bad behavior, his son Ken often impose fist.
sentences.chinese: 因爲行爲惡劣，老唐常遭兒子施以拳腳。

sentences.english: Cover antisepticresistant, able to withstand the most severe compressed air environment.
sentences.chinese: 端蓋防化學腐蝕，能夠承受最惡劣的壓縮空氣環境。

sentences.english: He even takes up a more rampant attitude and roared he will kill any cat in his sight.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至態度更惡劣地表示會見一隻貓就殺一隻。

sentences.english: I'll be there, right by your side, through all stormy weather, without fail, I promise.
sentences.chinese: 我保證一定在你的身旁，不管多麼惡劣，決不食言。

definition: it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
